name: Stability Remediation Workflow
description: Automated response to system stability issues including performance, reliability, and availability problems

subtasks.title: Analyze stability issue
subtasks.description: Investigate root cause of stability problem including performance metrics, error logs, and system resources

subtasks.title: Implement remediation
subtasks.description: Apply appropriate fix for stability issue based on analysis findings

subtasks.title: Verify fix effectiveness
subtasks.description: Test that stability issue is resolved and system performance meets requirements

subtasks.title: Monitor system stability
subtasks.description: Continuously monitor system to ensure stability issue does not recur
